simplesect.para: String view of the error description

briefdescription.para: Abstract base class for I2C device implementations in the HardFOC system.

detaileddescription.para: This header-only file defines the abstract base class for I2C device communication that provides a consistent API across different I2C controller implementations. Concrete implementations for various microcontrollers inherit from this class. Each BaseI2c instance represents a single I2C device with a pre-configured address.

simplesect.para: This is a header-only abstract base class following the same pattern as BaseCan.
Users should program against this interface, not specific implementations.
Each BaseI2c instance represents a specific I2C device, not the I2C bus itself.
